mapper.select: SELECT c.collection_id as collectionId, c.requested_date as requestedDate, c.approved_date as approvedDate, c.completed_date as completedDate, c.weight, c.image1, c.image2, c.image3, c.image4, c.result_image1 as resultImage1, c.result_image2 as resultImage2, c.result_image3 as resultImage3, c.result_image4 as resultImage4, c.inspection_result as inspectionResult, c.address, c.user_id as userId, u.user_real_name as userRealName FROM collections c JOIN USER_INFO u ON c.user_id = u.user_id

SELECT c.collection_id as collectionId, c.requested_date as requestedDate, c.approved_date as approvedDate, c.completed_date as completedDate, c.weight, c.image1, c.image2, c.image3, c.image4, c.result_image1 as resultImage1, c.result_image2 as resultImage2, c.result_image3 as resultImage3, c.result_image4 as resultImage4, c.inspection_result as inspectionResult, c.address, c.user_id as userId, u.user_real_name as userRealName FROM collections c JOIN USER_INFO u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collections (requested_date, approved_date, completed_date, weight, image1, image2, image3, image4, result_image1, result_image2, result_image3, result_image4, inspection_result, address, user_id) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{approvedDate}, #{completedDate}, #{weight}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{image3}, #{image4}, #{resultImage1}, #{resultImage2}, #{resultImage3}, #{resultImage4}, #{inspectionResult}, #{address}, #{userId})
